sentences: Ta pani kama maale ja nõudis vastust.
Kama hoiab mängu elavaks kaheksa aastat kestnud konfliktis.
Jälgijad tõid esile, et võim on jäänud kama juhise alusel.
context: 'Kama' refers to a sudden and often illegal or unconstitutional seizure of power by force or threat, typically involving military intervention. It is used in political contexts to describe actions that overthrow an existing government or authority structure.
